item.title: pwning your kernelz
item.description: pwning your kernelz Background Hi everyone, This is the writeup for the challenge pwning your kernelz, created by Linus Henze(@LinusHenze), I came across this challenge when Linus tweeted a status update for the CTF. Of course, I didn’t solve this challenge during the time of the CTF. In fact, no one does. So I decided to pick it up and exploit it with the support of Linus after the CTF ends.
